text: KWPB-LP (98.7 FM, "Winds of Praise") is a low-power radio station broadcasting a contemporary Christian music format. Licensed to Newport, Oregon, United States, the station is currently owned by Winds of Praise Broadcasting. ==References== ==External links== * * WPB-LP WPB-LP Category:Contemporary Christian radio stations in the United States Category:Newport, Oregon Category:Radio stations established in 1995 Category:1995 establishments in Oregon WPB-LP
title: KWPB-LP
